personal-dashboard-risky-article-edits-s: Help to keep Wikipedia reliable for readers by reviewing the following edits, which may need attention.
personal-dashboard-risky-article-edits-i: Each card displays information about the edit including:
personal-dashboard-risky-article-edits-e: Edit summary: a brief explanation of what changes were made
personal-dashboard-risky-article-edits-t: Tags that are used to identify a type of edit
